title: 090: Aligning with Success with Aileen of Lavendaire
itunes:title: 090: Aligning with Success with Aileen of Lavendaire
description:
I was searching one of my favorite words, ikigai (the Japanese term for purpose) on Youtube and I found Aileen’s channel Lavendaire.

We sat down for this interview to discuss:
-How she created a spiritually-focused brand and thriving Youtube channel
-The mindset needed for success
-Balancing spirituality with financial success
-How to be authentic while still having sponsors

If you’re interested in creating your own Youtube channel or journal like Aileen has, this episode is for you! Connect with her at lavendaire.com and @lavendaire on socials.


Be part of a community that supports you discovering your dharma in Rose Gold Goddesses, the sacred sisterhood collective with community, content, creativity and so much more — learn more about rosegoldgoddesses.com.

Get 35% off your order of Youveda supplements at youveda.com with code “sahara”

Intro + Outro Music: Silent Ganges by Maneesh de Moor

Discover your Dharma with my free quiz at https://iamsahararose.com/

Connect with me for daily Ayurvedic and modern spiritual wisdom at: Instagram.com/iamsahararose
Facebook.com/iamsahararose Twitter.com/iamsahararose

Order My Books Eat Feel Fresh + Idiot's Guide to Ayurveda: https://www.iamsahararose.com/books
